artist: Publisher: Buscada, New York; Publisher: Urban Studies Department, New School, New York
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Loose, folded leaves, white text on a blue ground along the top, three columns of black text in the center, and below a city plan of just a few blocks printed in blue; 8 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; loose, folded leaves
title: Exploring SPURA
